Name: Bubbly Buddy
AttributesDescription: Grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
Whether you're watching Agons or catching every clash in the arena, it's there for you.
Zero sugar. Zero calories. Packed with Bloodleaf Viburnums. Let it fire up the arena!
ObtainedShowDescription: Grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
